actions.text: Substitute (A004) offered by Mr. Campbell to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A003).
On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 198 (Roll no. 312).

purpose: Amendment no. 3 printed in Part A of H. Rept. 106-235 to prohibit any funding provided to the United Nations Population Fund to be used for abortion or for a country program in China and further reduces, dollar for dollar, the United States contribution for any U.N. funding for a Chinese government population control program.
